GameModel

Interface Combinable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bronze, CarbonSteel, Coal, Copper, Cotton, Feather, Gold, Hair, Iron, Leather, Material, Metal, Platinum, Silver, Skin, Steel, Stone, Tin, Wood

    public interface Combinable
    Things that may be combined with other things
